Dictionary of PipeOps

Source: R/mlr_pipeops.R
mlr_pipeops.Rd

A simple Dictionary storing objects of class PipeOp. Each PipeOp has an associated help page, see mlr_pipeop_[id].

Format

R6Class object inheriting from mlr3::Dictionary

Usage

See mlr3::Dictionary.

See also

Other mlr3pipelines backend related: Graph, PipeOpTaskPreprocSimple, PipeOpTaskPreproc, PipeOp

Other PipeOps: PipeOpEnsemble, PipeOpTaskPreproc, PipeOp, mlr_pipeop_NULL, mlr_pipeop_branch, mlr_pipeop_chunk, mlr_pipeop_copy, mlr_pipeop_encode, mlr_pipeop_featureunion, mlr_pipeop_filter, mlr_pipeop_learner, mlr_pipeop_majorityvote, mlr_pipeop_modelavg, mlr_pipeop_nloptmajorityvote, mlr_pipeop_pca, mlr_pipeop_scale, mlr_pipeop_subsample, mlr_pipeop_unbranch, mlr_pipeop_undersample
